price: (41) And whoever retaliates after having been wronged - those have not upon them any cause [for blame].
arabic: وَلَمَنِ ٱنتَصَرَ بَعۡدَ ظُلۡمِهِۦ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ مَا عَلَيۡهِم مِّن سَبِيلٍ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: walamani intaṣara baʿda ẓul'mihi fa-ulāika mā ʿalayhim min sabīlin
